<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Child of the Puddles](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=54)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

**Region** Absalom and Starstone Isle

</column>

You grew up in the soggy, squalid quarter of Absalom known as the Puddles. You’re at home in tightly packed urban environments.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Intelligence, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) skill, and the [Absalom Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Steady Balance](/Feats.aspx?ID=845) skill feat.
